document.full_text: top commodity trader glencore aims to raise up to $12.1 billion with a dual listing that will boost firepower for deals at the height of a resources boom and make paper fortunes for its publicity-shy partners.
document.title: glencore seeks up to $12.1 billion in ipo, names chair
